item.title: Index theory and bulk-boundary correspondence for inversion-symmetric second-order topological insulators
item.description: arXiv:2509.09240v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We provide an index-theoretic proof of the bulk-boundary correspondence for two- and three-dimensional second-order topological insulators that preserve inversion symmetry, which are modeled as rectangles and rectangular prism-shaped systems. Our method uses extensions of the symbols of some Toeplitz operators on discrete quarter planes and computations of topological equivariant K-theory groups.
item.dc:creator: Shin Hayashi
